original_text: No one speaks against them to say that they are guilty. No one punishes them for the bad things that they have done. No one speaks against them to say that they are guilty. korean_text: 누가 능히 그의 면전에서 그의 길을 알려 주며 누가 그의 소행을 보응하랴

sentences.original_text: to say that they are guilty
for the bad things that they have done
